snippet: The United Progressive party is accused of plotting an armed rebellion against the Seoul government in event of war with North Korea.
abstract: South Korean Pres Park Geun-hye's government asks the Constitutional Court to disband United Progressive Party, small leftist group accused of supporting North Korea at the cost of the South's national security.
lead_paragraph: The United Progressive party is accused of plotting an armed rebellion against the Seoul government in event of war with North Korea.

headline.main: South Korean Government Seeks  Ban on Small Leftist Party
headline.print_headline: South Korea: Government Seeks to Ban Leftist Party
